name: Onslaught (itch) (SiLeNTeK Game Studios)
description:
Capture, Hold and Protect the Ancient Arch of Wisdom.

This is our first attempt at designing something fast and simple with Manticore Game's Core game engine.

We hope to be using this engine for further development in the future but need to learn more about it first and become more comfortable with the platform.

Any feedback will be appreciated.
